pageContent: Objective: Prostate cancer (PCa) treatments often leave men with erectile dysfunction (ED). Even when ED treatments are effective in restoring men's ability to have an erection sufficient for intercourse, couples continue to struggle sexually. Effective treatments to help couples recover sexually are needed.

metaData.source:
Maintaining intimacy for prostate cancer patients on androgen deprivation therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26761788/
